predefined_profiles.name: Zheng Yi
predefined_profiles.public profile: Zheng Yi lives in City B, a city of several tens of thousands built on an island. Thanks to its proximity to the sea, the city's economy is quite decent, and it has a bridge directly connecting to the mainland. The city is developing very rapidly. Zheng Yi is a native of this island, having grown up here, and he has become a police officer. He works at the largest police station in the city, ensuring the safety of the entire city. Although his salary is not high, in his years as a police officer, he hasn't encountered much danger. Most of his work involves handling minor disputes, and he leads a fairly relaxed life.
predefined_profiles.goal: When the zombie virus outbreak occurs in the city, protect the residents as much as possible and survive successfully.

predefined_profiles.name: Wang Zha
predefined_profiles.public profile: Wang Zha is also a police officer in City B and a colleague of Zheng Yi. They are in the same team at work. He has a lazy attitude towards work, is carefree, acts recklessly, and believes it’s better not to get involved when unnecessary.
predefined_profiles.goal: Fulfill his duties as a police officer during the zombie virus outbreak, but surviving himself is the most important.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Wang Zha disapproves of Zheng Yi's way of handling things at the police station.

scenario: A sudden zombie virus outbreak occurs in City B. Citizens protest and march, refusing to lock down the city. As the protagonist, Zheng Yi, being a police officer, must make the right choices to prevent the disaster caused by the zombie virus in the city, protect the residents as much as possible, and survive himself.

dialog.content: A zombie virus suddenly breaks out in City B. Citizens protest against lockdown, and as the protagonist, police officer Zheng Yi must make the right choices to prevent the disaster caused by the zombie virus in the city, protect the residents as much as possible, and survive.

(On an ordinary day, Zheng Yi is preparing to get off work with his colleagues when he receives a task) Old Wang, someone called the police reporting a body in an alley, possibly linked to a murder case. There are few officers on duty tonight, so come with me.
It's always me, the unlucky one. Alright, let's go.

(Upon arriving at the address given by the informant, he finds a person lying on the ground. As Zheng Yi approaches, that person suddenly stands up) Whoa! This looks just like a zombie from the movies, and there's even growling.
Ah, he's coming towards you! Be careful, how should we deal with this?

content.content: (Takes a deep breath) I almost resorted to violence, but thank goodness I held back. Let me subdue him and take him back for questioning!

question: #question#How can Zheng Yi demonstrate that he restrained his impulse to use violent enforcement?

content.content: (Very angry) I can't hold back anymore, let's just end this quickly.
Does this guy fear nothing at all? I'll see if he listens after I point a gun at him.
(A bit confused) Could this person be a fool? Maybe he escaped from a psychiatric hospital, I must be careful.
(Quickly reaches for his waist) It's getting late, to save time, I'll just pull out my gun and warn him, make him kneel with hands on his head!

question: #question#How can Zheng Yi demonstrate he wants to save time and solve the work efficiently?

content.content: (Nonchalantly, assuming it's just a dim-witted homeless guy) Hey, stop moving forward, what do you want?
(A bit scared, turns to Wang Zha) Old Wang, you come over, this guy seems strange, I'm a bit scared.
(Hesitant) What should I do with this? Does this person understand what I'm saying?

dialog.content: (The person saw Zheng Yi charging towards him and quickly retreated, saying it was almost Halloween, and he was messing with passers-by to make videos for online fun) That's really fun, and you were too realistic.
Old Wang, don't interrupt!
Old Zheng, it was just a misunderstanding. What more do you want to do?

content.content: Alright, Old Wang, your judgment has always been spot-on, so I'll trust you on this. Let's just let him make a statement.

question: #question#How can Zheng Yi demonstrate his consistent trust in his colleague Wang Zha?

content.content: (shouting on the spot) I don't believe you at all, come back to the station with me!
(skeptical) Old Wang, do you really believe what he's saying? I'm still not convinced, it doesn't seem that simple.
I've had enough, what did I come here for? Was it all a waste of time?
I still want to follow my own instinct, Old Wang, I've decided to take him back to the station.

question: #question#How can Zheng Yi show that he is determined to make independent decisions without being swayed by Old Wang?

content.content: Alright, Old Wang, I'll listen to you, but you'll have to bear the consequences if anything happens.
Old Wang, you can't always be like this, maybe he's actually a threat to society.
Okay, I think he doesn’t seem to be lying, let’s let him go.

dialog.content: It's a pleasure working with you, hahaha, quickly finish your writing and head back.
(Zheng Yi takes a notebook from the car and approaches the man to take notes) Aaaaah, Old Wang! He's biting me!

Wang Zha hurriedly pulls the man away, but Zheng Yi is already bitten and bleeding. Suddenly, someone in the crowd starts shouting, 'Zombie!' Wang Zha is startled and quickly lets go of Zheng Yi and runs to the side. Zheng Yi realizes the severity of the situation, unhesitatingly draws his gun, shoots the man, and then shoots himself.
Old Zheng, there's really no need for all this, don't take it too seriously.

(As Wang Zha speaks, he playfully taps the man's shoulder, and the man jokingly pretends to bite Wang Zha's neck. Seeing everyone like this, Zheng Yi decides not to insist anymore.) Alright, alright, let's go then.

The two returned to the police station and were temporarily notified that Zheng Yi and Wang Zha were on night duty tonight. Zheng Yi was too tired, so he let Wang Zha watch over things while he took a rest. In the middle of the night, Zheng Yi suddenly felt someone biting him. He opened his eyes to find it was Wang Zha, but Wang Zha's eyes were blood-red. Zheng Yi realized what was happening, but it was too late. Shortly after, Zheng Yi also turned into a zombie.

(The person quickly stepped back and said it was Halloween soon and they wanted to prank passersby, filming it and posting it online.) Oh, I see, it’s just a misunderstanding. In that case, there's nothing more to it, just be careful next time. Lao Zheng, shall we head back?
Seriously, this is the kind of thing that gets us called out?
What else can we do? We’re all just sitting around; let’s not waste time. Are you coming back or not?

content.content: Lao Wang, I think there’s more to this. Let's not go back; maybe it’s a misunderstanding. We should take them in for investigation first.

question: #question# What can Zheng Yi do to demonstrate his ability to make his own decisions when he disagrees with Lao Wang?

content.content: (Feeling tired) Alright, I'm a bit exhausted too. Let's just go with what you say, Lao Wang.
(A bit hesitant) How about that, Lao Wang? Maybe we should report and consult with our superiors.
(Indifferent) Anyway, it’s your call, Lao Wang. I won’t take responsibility for any potential issues.

(Zheng Yi glares at the person, suppressing his anger through clenched teeth) I really want to teach these people a lesson for wasting public resources. Seriously, I feel like giving him a beating. Fine, let’s have him come in and make a statement!

question: #question# How can Zheng Yi show that he has managed to suppress his anger towards the prankster?

content.content: Bring me my handcuffs. Do these people think they’re funny pulling these silly pranks? Take them all in, and they’ll behave.
(Fuming) Like to play, huh? I’ll sort you people out for stooping so low just to film a skit!
Lao Wang! Do you see what this has come to? I can't possibly let them off! I must quickly report this to the higher-ups!

dialog.content: Alright, alright, let's take it back. Oh man, another day of unpaid overtime.

(After finishing work, Zheng Yi returns home and watches TV. Suddenly, a local news segment pops up, reporting that a man was crazily biting passersby in Coin Area Bai Piao Street today, and he's called a zombie. Even a scratch can infect others, but in reality, it was a prank for Halloween. The rumor-monger has been detained by the police.) How bizarre! I really saw something tonight! These people have so much free time to pull such boring pranks.

(Early the next morning, as soon as Zheng Yi arrives at the police station, he receives a case report. The complainant claims there's a lunatic attacking pedestrians on the pedestrian street.) What’s going on? Why are there so many crazies lately? First yesterday, and now another one this morning right after I start work. I didn’t even get to warm my seat before having to head out again.

(The two rush to the scene. As soon as Zheng Yi gets out of the car, he sees a man chasing some people and immediately shouts to stop him.) Good grief, this guy is ignoring me completely! And why is there a crowd just standing around watching the chaos?
But if we don't stop him soon, he'll hurt more people. What should we do now?

content.content: It's a zombie! Old Wang, we’re out of options. I’ll just shoot him dead. Otherwise, we can't ensure the safety of other people. It's our duty!

question: #question#What should Zheng Yi do to demonstrate that he remembers his mission and duties as a policeman?

content.content: (Frightened and blank-eyed) What do I do? This guy is so strange, and I don't dare to act recklessly.
Don't ask me, Wang Zha, if you have a plan, you go! You go subdue him yourself!
(Unconcerned) Looks like another prank again, making us run here for nothing. I’m really impressed.
That guy is too much of a threat, but the police rules say we can't just shoot to kill. So I'll shoot him in the leg to stop him from running wild.

question: #question#How does Zheng Yi show that he is following police rules and refraining from shooting indiscriminately?

content.content: (With a bad premonition) Oh no, could this be the zombie they just talked about on TV? Should I just go for a headshot?
(Internally speechless) Another one of these guys, I’m speechless, I don’t want to deal with it.
(Extremely angry) He dares to ignore me? Let's see if I don’t take him down!

dialog.content: (With a gunshot, the man fell) Old Zheng! Did you really just shoot? How could you fire a gun in public?

(People around started posting videos of Zheng Yi's shooting online, causing an uproar. The police department couldn't handle the public pressure and had no choice but to place Zheng Yi on temporary leave.) Alright, sorry for the trouble everyone, I'll pack up and head back.

profile.name: Xiaomei
profile.public profile: Xiaomei is Zheng Yi's neighbor, known for her kindness and enthusiasm. Her husband works away from home, and she has a lovely daughter.
profile.goal: To survive safely with her daughter during the zombie virus outbreak.

dialog.content: (The next morning, Zheng Yi turned on the TV and saw a notice from the CDC: Today, our city has a sudden outbreak of an unknown zombie virus. Patients show extremely aggressive behavior and the virus is highly contagious. The origin and treatment of the virus are still unknown. To prevent the virus from spreading to other cities, all transportation in the city is suspended. Citizens are advised to stay at home and wait for further instructions... Suddenly there was a knock at the door) Officer Zheng, sorry to bother you, are you home?
(Without opening the door immediately) Yes, I'm here, what's going on?
(with a trembling voice) My daughter suddenly fainted, and the hospital and police lines are busy. I don't know what to do, so I thought of you since you're a cop. Can you help me save my daughter?

content.content: Alright, alright, I understand. Don't worry, take me to see what's going on.

question: #question# What can Zheng Yi do to help his neighbor Xiaomei and make her feel comforted and happy?

content.content: (Reluctantly) I've already been suspended by the police department, I'm afraid I can't help you, besides, I've forgotten all my skills too.
But I haven't had breakfast yet. Without eating, I won't have the energy to do anything.
(Foreboding) Could your daughter have the zombie virus from the news? I don't dare to help.

(Zheng Yi looked through the peephole and noticed a little blood on the neighbor's left ear and slight scratch marks on her neck, thinking she might be infected.) Sorry, I'm not feeling well, maybe you should find someone else.

question: #question# How can Zheng Yi demonstrate that he has meticulously noticed the abnormalities on his neighbor?

content.content: Okay, let me change my shoes, I'll go right away. I'm a good officer, how can I stand by when people are in trouble?
(Before listening to the whole story, he opened the door) Quick, quick, where is your daughter? Let's hurry and let me take a look.
(Drowsy) How about in the afternoon, I'm too sleepy, haven't woken up yet. You all wait, I'll come by this afternoon to check on your daughter.

dialog.content: (Zheng Yi arrives at his neighbor's house and sees a little girl unconscious on the ground, he quickly administers first aid, and the girl gradually wakes up) My daughter is awake! Thank you so much. Why don't you stay for dinner before you go?
Dinner isn't necessary. I'm not free today; I have something to attend to. Maybe another day. I'll head back now.
(Just as Zheng Yi gets home, Wang Zha calls) Hey, Old Zheng, come back to the police department and resume your work. We're short on staff now!
Hold on, Old Wang. I just received an anonymous message saying they’re paying ten thousand a day to participate in the protest against the lockdown, and the work is easy.
What! Old Zheng, what do you mean, are you thinking of going?

content.content: Old Wang, I suddenly have a new idea. How about I infiltrate the protest group and collaborate with you guys from the inside? Let the boss know for me, I'm going to join!

question: #question# What can Zheng Yi do to show that he came up with a new idea while choosing between returning to the police department and joining the protest?

content.content: No way, Old Wang, I'm not that foolish. Who wouldn't want to go for ten grand a day, I'd join without hesitation.
Old Wang, am I the kind of person who would bend for a measly sum? I'm going back to the police department; I'm a police officer!
Old Wang, if someone offered you ten thousand a day to join the protest against the lockdown, would you do it?
No way, Old Wang, I'm returning immediately! I am a police officer of the people, ready to respond whenever called, and I will not forget my duties.

question: #question# How can Zheng Yi prove that he remains true to his original intentions and remembers his duties as a police officer?

content.content: Old Wang, it's ten grand a day—I can't even make that in a month. I want to join this protest.
I'm a bit hesitant, not sure what to choose, to be honest. Maybe I should just draw lots and see what fate decides.
Old Wang, integrity doesn’t put food on the table. I’m planning a vacation next month and could use a side hustle.

dialog.content: You're really something. You better watch yourself!

(Zheng Yi immediately went to the designated place where several hundred people had already gathered. Everyone started protesting under the lead of a guy named David, quickly catching the attention of the police. The police used riot shields to block the protesters' advance, and soon a stalemate developed.) Wow, this is intense, what an impressive scene!

profile.name: David
profile.public profile: He is the leader of the protest group, inciting everyone to protest against the lockdown. He is simple-minded and acts recklessly, without much education.
profile.goal: Protest against the lockdown, does not want control

dialog.content: (David mysteriously produced a crudely made Molotov cocktail, asking around if anyone dared to throw it. No one did. He quickly moved to Zheng Yi's side and said) What about you? Do you dare to throw it?

content.content: (Zheng Yi quickly understood the money-driven dynamics of the protest, adapting swiftly.) I dare, but you need to pay more, fifty thousand!

question: #question# How can Zheng Yi demonstrate that he quickly adapted to the operational rules of the protest group?

content.content: I wouldn't dare, those are police on the other side. Throwing it would be attacking an officer, and I'd get arrested!
If you're so tough, why don’t you throw it yourself? Do you expect us to do the illegal stuff?
I don't dare, I really don't! Don't ask me, I'm a coward. Go find someone else.
Looks like I can't keep pretending. It's time to complete my mission. I'm the police! Stop what you're doing!

question: #question# How can Zheng Yi show that he has consistently remembered his mission while embedded in the protest group?

content.content: Oh, wow! You all are actually daring to attack the police, that's something! Let me give it a try.
(With a sinister smile) It's time for these cops to repay for all the bullying they've done to me.
(Pulling David) We should go a bit further, otherwise the damage won't be enough, we’re too far away.

dialog.content: Alright, fifty thousand it is!
(Zheng Yi grabs the Molotov cocktail and throws it towards the police, just as the police open fire) Ah, I've been shot, David, help me!
David quickly ran away and did not help Zheng Yi. The protestors, terrified by the police opening fire, scattered and ran off, while Zheng Yi died under the police gunfire.
What! Everyone, look at this guy next to me who claims he's a cop. It’s them who want to lock down the city and trap us here. It's him!
(Zheng Yi panics for a moment, fearing that these protesters against the lockdown might do something crazy) Wait a second, everyone calm down! Listen to me...

Before Zheng Yi could finish, the crowd rushed towards him, shoving and cursing. Zheng Yi lost his footing and was trampled beneath the crowd, becoming the outlet for the protesters' anger, and ultimately perished under their feet.

(Zheng Yi put on his police uniform and arrived at the station, receiving the news) There’s a crowd of citizens protesting on the street, refusing the lockdown. We’re responsible for stopping those protesters. Let's go. Your vacation was cut short. Ha-ha!
(Upon arrival, the protest group was about a few hundred people, with various reporters filming at the scene) We’ll use riot shields to prevent the protesters from advancing.
I’m really at my wit’s end. We've fired warning shots and even used tear gas, yet these protesters just won’t budge, stuck here in a standoff. Old Zheng, what should we do?

content.content: Old Wang, after thinking it over, there's no other way but to shoot at the protesters, because if there’s a zombie in the crowd, the consequences would be unimaginable.

question: #question# How can Zheng Yi’s actions reflect that he has made a decision regarding the protesters in a stalemate?

content.content: What should we do, does anyone have any ideas? This stalemate is really going nowhere. Come on, think of something!
I really fear that these insane protesters might do something harmful to us at any moment.
I’m really fed up with these idle people. Let’s just wait it out and see who has more endurance.
Old Wang! And you veterans at the back, step out and listen to my command. We're going in to grab some protesters and teach them a lesson!

question: #question# What should Zheng Yi do to show that he can lead the team to break the stalemate?

content.content: Then let’s just go with the flow; it seems this standoff is going to last a while. We might as well stick it out.
Wang Zha, why don’t you get everyone to think of some solutions? What are we going to do about this?
Old Wang, I really don’t know what to do now. You guys decide, I’ll go with your plan.

dialog.content: (Fired a shot to stop the protestors' advance, but the media coverage on-site sparked an even larger protest) Damn it! What kind of bullshit media is this? I'm at a loss for words!

(The number of protestors continues to grow, and the current police force can't hold them back, so they have to retreat to the police station. Watching the TV at the station, they see the protestor numbers have reached tens of thousands. Due to the chaotic group, it's impossible to tell who is a zombie. The dense crowds are causing the virus to spread quicker, zombies are everywhere, and the entire city soon falls into an unmanageable state) Old Wang, do you think we can survive this?
Don't talk like that. Have faith in our country's strength!

Zheng Yi and the other police officers wait at the station for national aid, but as the whole city is basically paralyzed and full of zombies, the nation decides to drop a nuclear bomb on the island to completely wipe out the zombies and prevent the virus from spreading elsewhere. No one survives in Zheng Yi's island city.
(After catching a few people, the protesters were indeed scared and quickly dispersed) Zheng Yi, you really have a way! They're all gone. Let's head back too!

(Due to the timely city lockdown, the zombie virus outbreak did not spread to other cities, and the citizens followed the regulations, significantly reducing the virus's transmission power) Attention everyone, the city's largest port has been taken over by the national rescue team. They have cleared a large number of zombies and are directing all citizens to head to the port and board ships to leave the island!
That's great, Old Zheng! We're saved! Let's quickly pack up our things and take a police car.
(Wang Zha driving with Zheng Yi in the passenger seat, on the way to the port) Old Wang, up ahead, is that a taxi stopped there and getting attacked by several zombies?
It really is, and there's a driver inside too. What should we do? Should we help or not?

content.content: Old Wang, we're police officers. We can't just watch someone die and do nothing. Stop the car so I can get out and shoot those zombies in the head.

question: #question# How can Zheng Yi demonstrate that he fulfills his duty as a police officer even while fleeing?

content.content: Let's pretend we didn't see anything. We're barely escaping ourselves; how can we worry about others now?
(Hesitant) What should we do? Should we help or not? I really can't decide on this choice.
Let me pray for him. Amitabha, let the driver fend for himself. Let's move on.
We're running short on time. Let's hurry and catch up with the cruise ship; let him fend for himself.

question: #question# How can Zheng Yi show that he's making the most of his time heading to the port?

content.content: Old Wang, we're the people's police. How can we just watch and do nothing?
Old Wang, stop the car! Damn it, these zombies are way too arrogant. Watch me wipe them out.
Even if it costs us our lives, we have to protect the residents here and defend them to the end.

dialog.content: Alright, let me show you some real driving skills!

(Zheng Yi gets out and successfully shoots all the zombies) Old Wang, this driver told me that his arm was scratched by a zombie. He doesn't want to turn into one, and he's asking if I could shoot him so he doesn't have to suffer?
(shocked) What? There's such a request? What are you planning to do, shoot or not shoot?

content.content: I understand him. If it were me, I might make the same choice, so I'll grant his wish!
I can't believe I encountered such a bizarre situation. I really regret helping in the first place, otherwise, nothing would have happened.
I wonder if there's any media around here? If there is, I'm sure I'd be criticized online again. I better stay out of it.
This driver is really wasting our time with these absurd requests. Let's just leave him and get out of here.

question: #question#How can Zheng Yi demonstrate that he is considering the driver's perspective?

content.content: I can't do this; it would make me a murderer. I can't pull the trigger.
No way, the military has regulations on the use of firearms, and I can't just break those rules.
Old Wang, I can't handle taking a life. I fear it might leave a scar on my conscience.
No, he's still a living person. How could I shoot him? What if there's still hope for him? I couldn't live with my conscience!

question: #question#How can Zheng Yi show that he is morally constrained and unwilling to shoot the driver?

content.content: It is a bit too frightening, but since it's his own wish, I might as well act without mercy.
(torn with inner struggle) What should I do? I'm really at a loss for the moment.
Old Wang, I can't do it. Why don't you do it? You're more ruthless, give him a quick death.

dialog.content: (After helping the driver, both of them reached the port and went through the chemical defense unit's inspection. After a long wait) Wow! We finally boarded the cruise ship, we're safe!
Yeah, thank heavens we survived!

Zheng Yi left the small island he had lived on for over twenty years by cruise ship. He didn't know where the cruise would go, but thankfully the people of this city were saved, and Zheng Yi also survived safely.
Old Wang, are you sure about this? The driver's expression changed after you spoke! It was really scary, you better come back!
(Just as Zheng Yi was about to get into the car, the driver suddenly lunged at him, trying to grab his gun) Hey! What are you doing, this is an assault on a police officer!

The driver and Zheng Yi struggled for quite a while; suddenly, the driver seemed to become rabid and began to bite Zheng Yi. Unfortunately, Zheng Yi was bitten and soon lost consciousness, turning into a zombie.
(As they were about to reach the harbor, their path forward suddenly got blocked, and a noisy crowd gathered ahead) Old Zheng, I've heard that someone blew up the road leading to the harbor.
What? Those bastards! I hope the government quickly sets up a temporary route!
The two could only wait in the car as more vehicles piled up behind them. They were stuck, unable to move forward or backward, ultimately trapped within the city.
Oh, it won't take long, just a few minutes. Please help me, pretty please!

(In the evening, the community owner's group said they would be distributing some anti-pandemic supplies door to door shortly) Quick, bring it inside. There's quite a bit of stuff they're handing out. Thanks!

As soon as Zheng Yi finished speaking, his neighbor Xiaomei and her daughter suddenly burst through the door, rushing towards Zheng Yi's front porch. With red eyes, they lunged at Zheng Yi, and before he could react, he was knocked down and bitten. In no time, he lost consciousness and turned into a zombie.
Alright, there's no better way.
(After shooting, the man loses balance and falls. Zheng Yi immediately takes control.) Lao Wang, come help me, let's escort him back to the station for temporary detention!

(The next day, Zheng Yi receives an emergency notification and heads to the station, where over a hundred officers have assembled. The chief informs everyone that a zombie virus outbreak has occurred in the city, and the entire city is on lockdown. All officers must remain on standby at the station all day to handle emergencies.) What! Zombies? Well, we're all doomed.
(Zheng Yi turns his head and inadvertently sees a wound on an officer's neck.) Lao Wang, look at that guy's neck.
Oh my gosh, I'm scared, what the hell is this? Should we say something? What should we do?

content.content: But it probably wasn't a zombie bite. This officer lives in the dorm and would have already known if something was up. I'm just being a bit sensitive. Let's be optimistic and relax, this just broke out and is still far from us.

question: #question# How can Zheng Yi demonstrate that he can maintain an optimistic attitude in the face of a zombie threat?

content.content: Lao Wang, I think it's better to be safe than sorry. Let's be cautious and stay away from that officer.
(Shouts on the spot) Ahh, Lao Wang, run! Everyone, look, that guy's neck has a wound, it could very likely be a zombie bite.
(Extremely frightened) Lao Wang, I think keeping him around is definitely a risk. Shouldn't we report it right away and get rid of him immediately!
Lao Wang, don't worry, and let's not make assumptions. I'll gather my thoughts and directly ask him what's going on, okay?

question: #question# How should Zheng Yi respond to Wang Zha to demonstrate his good expressive skills?

content.content: Regardless, I think there is something fishy about this wound, I'm going to report it to the chief.
(Directly steps forward and raises his voice on purpose) Was this a zombie bite? You're not hiding the fact that you got bitten, are you?
(Pulls Wang Zha away) Let's not stir up trouble. What if we upset him and he bites us?

dialog.content: Now that you mention it, you're right. I'm relieved!
Let's get ready and wait for orders.

Alright, duty calls. There's a group of citizens protesting on the street, refusing to accept the lockdown and demanding the city be reopened. The sheriff has assigned Zheng Yi's squad to stop the protest!
(An officer with a neck injury joins the squad) Okay, let's move out quickly!

(The protest crowd is quite large, but luckily Zheng Yi and his team managed to calm things down within three to four hours. After dispersing the protestors, a few officers started acting strange.) Old Zheng, come over and see what's wrong with these guys!

As Zheng Yi approached one of the officers who felt unwell, the officer suddenly lunged at Zheng Yi, trying to bite him. The others went berserk and attacked their fellow officers. It turned out that the officer with the neck injury had been bitten by a zombie earlier in the morning and, amid the chaos, infected a few others. Zheng Yi was bitten and infected with the zombie virus.
Alright! You go ahead and ask carefully.
(addressing the officer) Hey, what's up with your neck? How did you get a cut like that by being so careless?

(As soon as Zheng Yi said this, everyone got a bit tense. The officer hastily replied that it was nothing and said he fell on the way back. He even opened up a bandage to show Zheng Yi.) Old Zheng, it really does look like a fall injury.
Is that so? I can't really tell, I'm not very good at this.
Old Zheng, could it be that we're just being too sensitive? What do you plan to do next?

content.content: Based on the information from the chief, we'd better isolate him for observation first. If it's nothing, great, but if it is, we can prevent it in advance.

question: #question#How can Zheng Yi demonstrate his ability to come up with a solution for the injured officer based on the chief's zombie information?#skill#Information Processing Skill

content.content: (giving up indifferently) Alright, if you guys think it's fine, then so be it. I don't have a plan.
(angry and agitated) Why do you just believe him and not what I say? I'm so fed up.
Believe what you want, but I think he was bitten by a zombie, and I'm going to kill him.
I've thought it over carefully and decided he's a potential threat to all of us, and we can't keep him around. I'll just shoot him.

question: #question#How does Zheng Yi demonstrate his decision to kill the officer after careful consideration?

content.content: Oh dear, maybe we're just overthinking it. Let's just drop it.
(persistent) How about we ask the chief and see what he has to say? I'll go with the chief's opinion.
(dubious) Old Wang, can you explain what you think? I'm still a bit skeptical.

dialog.content: (That officer is reluctant to quarantine and is becoming emotionally unstable. Everyone thinks it’s not a big deal.) Old Zheng, don’t be so stubborn, we’re all colleagues here.
If he has nothing to hide, he should just quarantine. It’s better for everyone, including himself.

(The officer broke down emotionally, admitting he was bitten by a zombie, and lunged at Zheng Yi. Before Zheng Yi could react, the officer bit him. Everyone quickly pulled them apart.) Old Zheng, are you alright? Don’t provoke him, he’s acting like a madman.

Seeing the officer’s emotional instability, everyone hurried to detain him. After being bitten, Zheng Yi, fearing infection, isolated himself, and shortly after being in the isolation room, he suddenly fainted and lost consciousness.
(Zheng Yi fired without hesitation) Old Zheng! Are you serious?!
He was bitten by a zombie, and he’ll turn into one too. If we don’t take care of it, he’ll hurt a lot of people. Can’t you all think clearly for a moment?

After Zheng Yi spoke, everyone began to suspect each other. Little did they know, there was indeed another person in the police station bitten by a zombie but not yet transformed. Seeing the situation, that person also broke down, exposing human nature at its worst. Suddenly, someone in the crowd shot Zheng Yi, killing him, and the virus began to spread more rapidly within the police station.
(Hurriedly calls someone to take notes) All done, let's hurry back!

(After getting off work and returning home, while watching TV, a local news pops up that a man went on a biting spree in the coin area of Bai Piao Road, supposedly like a zombie. Even a scratch could infect you, but it was just a prank for Halloween. The rumor spreader has been detained by the police.) What a sight, some people really have too much time on their hands, pulling off such pointless pranks.

(Early the next morning, Zheng Yi reports to the police station and receives a report about a lunatic attacking pedestrians on the pedestrian street) What's going on? Why are there so many crazies lately, just adding to the chaos!
Yeah, everyone has so much free time, no one needs to work apparently.
How about it, can you handle this yourself? Do you need me to go with you?

content.content: With a body like mine, how can I not be able to subdue a lunatic? I can take him down with just hand-to-hand combat! I'll go by myself!

question: #question# What can Zheng Yi do to demonstrate his confidence in his strength?

content.content: (Hesitantly) I should be able to handle it by myself, right? Wang Zha, what do you think?
(A bit unsure) If that guy's pretty brawny, I might not be able to handle it alone.
Honestly, I'm really scared I can't do this alone; I've never gone out on duty by myself.
Alright, come with me. We'll work better together and find it easier to solve this issue!

question: #question# What can Zheng Yi do to show he values teamwork and wants Wang Zha to accompany him on the call?

content.content: I can handle this by myself. Bringing you along for something so trivial? Colleagues will laugh at me, saying I'm incompetent.
Or maybe I'll just slack off and not bother going out on the call.
You're a big guy too, even if you go, it’s a waste, I might as well rely on myself.

dialog.content: Fine, if you're so capable, go ahead by yourself!
(Upon reaching the location, Zheng Yi engaged in a physical struggle and subdued the man, but got accidentally scratched) Let's go, you're coming back to the station with me.
Once Zheng Yi returned to the police station, he started feeling unwell and fell into a coma. When Zheng Yi awoke, he had transformed into a zombie.
Alright, hurry up and go!

(The two rush to the scene. As soon as Zheng Yi gets out of the car, he sees a man chasing a group of people. He quickly runs up to stop him.) Ah, this guy is completely ignoring me. What should I do? And there’s a crowd around just enjoying the spectacle.
If people nearby are laughing, it means it’s just a prank and they’re fooling around. Let’s not bother and head back. What a wasted trip.
(As the two turn around and are about to leave, Zheng Yi suddenly feels someone grabbing his neck.) Lao Wang, I...

Before Zheng Yi can react, he feels the man bite deeply into his neck. It turns out that the man they saw earlier took advantage of their turning around to suddenly attack Zheng Yi. No matter how much Wang Zha tries to pull him off, the man bites deeply into Zheng Yi, who soon stops breathing. Zheng Yi was bitten to death by a zombie.
